I am [Associate Professor of Population Health](https://www.jefferson.edu/academics/colleges-schools-institutes/population-health.html) and Program Director of the [PhD in Population Health Science](https://www.jefferson.edu/academics/colleges-schools-institutes/population-health/degrees-programs/population-health-science-phd.html) and [MS in Health Data Science](https://www.jefferson.edu/academics/colleges-schools-institutes/population-health/degrees-programs/health-data-science.html). I am a statistician, psychometrician, data scientist, and cognitive scientist studying patient and clinical outcomes assessment, EHR predictive models, and attitudes toward AI in medicine.

This page contains code and tutorials for students and other researchers. You can find out more about me at my [Jefferson Webpage](https://www.jefferson.edu/academics/colleges-schools-institutes/population-health/administration-faculty-staff/faculty/hass.html)
